mapper.insert: insert into log(log_time, level, logger, line, log_id, data) values(#{logTime}, #{level}, #{logger}, #{line}, #{logId}, #{data})
mapper.select: select log_time, level, logger, line, log_id, data from log where data like CONCAT(#{data}, '%')
mapper.update: create table if not exists log ( id int primary_key not null auto_increment, logTime bigint not null, level varchar(20) not null, logger varchar(100) not null, line varchar(800) not null, logId varchar(100) not null, data varchar(800) not null, );
